data.text: @FerdyOnFilms @Roderick_Heath anyway - do read his whole piece (you may still hate it ;) )
@FerdyOnFilms that line is offputting. But did you read whole piece? also brings up interchangeable males, while talking abt roles women get
@FerdyOnFilms @craigary Usual justification for this sort of thing is subtext this person displaced someone 'deserving' in the firmament.
@FerdyOnFilms was a bit misogynist wasn't it? I do think points abt Hudson/Lively being interchangeably terrible actresses isn't wrong tho
